name: NormedField.valuation_apply
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
hK : NormedField K
inst✝ : IsUltrametricDist K
x : K
⊢ Eq (NormedField.valuation x) (NNNorm.nnnorm x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem valuation_apply (x : K) : valuation x = ‖x‖₊ := rfl

name: Valued.norm_nonneg
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x : L
⊢ LE.le 0 (Valued.norm x)
decl: theorem norm_nonneg (x : L) : 0 ≤ norm x := by simp only [norm, NNReal.zero_le_coe]

name: Valued.norm_add_le
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x y : L
⊢ LE.le (Valued.norm (HAdd.hAdd x y)) (Max.max (Valued.norm x) (Valued.norm y))
decl:
theorem norm_add_le (x y : L) : norm (x + y) ≤ max (norm x) (norm y) := by
  simp only [norm, NNReal.coe_le_coe, le_max_iff, StrictMono.le_iff_le hv.strictMono]
  exact le_max_iff.mp (Valuation.map_add_le_max' val.v _ _)

name: Valued.norm_eq_zero
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x : L
hx : Eq (Valued.norm x) 0
⊢ Eq x 0
decl:
theorem norm_eq_zero {x : L} (hx : norm x = 0) : x = 0 := by
  simpa [norm, NNReal.coe_eq_zero, RankOne.hom_eq_zero_iff, zero_iff] using hx

name: Valued.isNonarchimedean_norm
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
⊢ IsNonarchimedean fun x => Norm.norm x
decl: protected lemma isNonarchimedean_norm : IsNonarchimedean ((‖·‖): L → ℝ) := Valued.norm_add_le

name: Valued.instIsUltrametricDist
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
⊢ IsUltrametricDist L
decl:
instance : IsUltrametricDist L :=
  ⟨fun x y z ↦ by
    refine (Valued.norm_add_le (x - y) (y - z)).trans_eq' ?_
    simp only [sub_add_sub_cancel]
    rfl ⟩

name: Valued.coe_valuation_eq_rankOne_hom_comp_valuation
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
⊢ Eq (⇑NormedField.valuation) (Function.comp ⇑(Valuation.RankOne.hom Valued.v) ⇑Valued.v)

name: Valued.toNormedField.norm_le_iff
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x x' : L
⊢ Iff (LE.le (Norm.norm x) (Norm.norm x')) (LE.le (Valued.v x) (Valued.v x'))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem norm_le_iff : ‖x‖ ≤ ‖x'‖ ↔ val.v x ≤ val.v x' :=
  (Valuation.RankOne.strictMono val.v).le_iff_le

name: Valued.toNormedField.norm_lt_iff
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x x' : L
⊢ Iff (LT.lt (Norm.norm x) (Norm.norm x')) (LT.lt (Valued.v x) (Valued.v x'))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem norm_lt_iff : ‖x‖ < ‖x'‖ ↔ val.v x < val.v x' :=
  (Valuation.RankOne.strictMono val.v).lt_iff_lt

name: Valued.toNormedField.norm_le_one_iff
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x : L
⊢ Iff (LE.le (Norm.norm x) 1) (LE.le (Valued.v x) 1)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem norm_le_one_iff : ‖x‖ ≤ 1 ↔ val.v x ≤ 1 := by
  simpa only [_root_.map_one] using (Valuation.RankOne.strictMono val.v).le_iff_le (b := 1)

name: Valued.toNormedField.norm_lt_one_iff
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x : L
⊢ Iff (LT.lt (Norm.norm x) 1) (LT.lt (Valued.v x) 1)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem norm_lt_one_iff : ‖x‖ < 1 ↔ val.v x < 1 := by
  simpa only [_root_.map_one] using (Valuation.RankOne.strictMono val.v).lt_iff_lt (b := 1)

name: Valued.toNormedField.one_le_norm_iff
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x : L
⊢ Iff (LE.le 1 (Norm.norm x)) (LE.le 1 (Valued.v x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem one_le_norm_iff : 1 ≤ ‖x‖ ↔ 1 ≤ val.v x := by
  simpa only [_root_.map_one] using (Valuation.RankOne.strictMono val.v).le_iff_le (a := 1)

name: Valued.toNormedField.one_lt_norm_iff
initialProofState:
L : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field L
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
val : Valued L Γ₀
hv : Valued.v.RankOne
x : L
⊢ Iff (LT.lt 1 (Norm.norm x)) (LT.lt 1 (Valued.v x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem one_lt_norm_iff : 1 < ‖x‖ ↔ 1 < val.v x := by
  simpa only [_root_.map_one] using (Valuation.RankOne.strictMono val.v).lt_iff_lt (a := 1)
